Strings.Text: {scroll 2}A device to check the \nwater quality.{clear 0}A {color 1}Water Sample{color 0} seems \nto be required.
{scroll 2}There's a device to check \nthe water quality.{clear 0}Will you operate it?\n{branch 0}
{scroll 2}There's a tiny slot where \na plastic card could fit.

{scroll 2}‟Water pollution alert...
Blocking of the abolition{clear 0}area passage is now in
progress.”{clear 0}‟To maintain safety, the
lock will not be released{clear 0}until a manual check has
been performed.”
{scroll 2}The result graph is \ndifferent from the sample.
{scroll 2}‟Water quality check has \npassed the safety level.”
